response.original_title: Pacific Opera Project: Abduction from the Seraglio
response.overview: Set your phasers for fun and join us for an interactive intergalactic adventure--POP's hit 2016 production of Abduction from the Seraglio at The Ford Amphitheatre. In this time when "the needs of the many, outweigh the needs of the few", we invite you to boldly go where no virtual opera audience has gone before.
response.tagline: POP went to a whole new level with this Sci-fi hit, a Star Trek-inspired Die Entf√ºhrung aus dem Serail.
response.title: Pacific Opera Project: Abduction from the Seraglio
